Verses: 1 appozhudhu Erusalemilirundhu Vandha Vedhapaarakarum Pariseyarum Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu:
2 ummudaiya Seeshargal Munnorgalin Paarampariyaththai En Meeri Nadakkiraargal? Kaikazhuvaamal Pojanam Pannukiraargale! Endraargal.
3 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Ungal Paarampariyaththinaale Dhevanudaiya Karpanaiyai En Meeri Nadakkireergal?
4 un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Kanampannuvaayaaga Endrum; Thagappanaiyaavadhu Thaayaiyaavadhu Nindhikkiravan Kollappadavendum Endrum, Dhevan Karpiththirukkiraare.

5 neengalo, Evanaagilum Thagappanaiyaavadhu Thaayaiyaavadhu Nokki: Unakku Naan Seyyaththakka Udhavi Edhu Undo, Adhaik Kaanikkaiyaagak Kodukkiren Endru Solli, Than Thagappanaiyaavadhu Thaayaiyaavadhu Kanampannaamarponaalum, Avanudaiya Kadamai Theerndhadhendru Podhiththu,
6 ungal Paarampariyaththinaale Dhevanudaiya Karpanaiyai Avamaakkivarugireergal.
7 maayakkaarare, Ungalaikkuriththu:
8 indha Janangal Thangal Vaayinaal Ennidaththil Serndhu, Thangal Uthadugalinaal Ennaik Kanampannugiraargal; Avargal Irudhayamo Enakkuth Thooramaai Vilagiyirukkiradhu.
9 manusharudaiya Karpanaigalai Ubadhesangalaagappodhiththu, Veenaai Enakku Aaraadhanai Seygiraargal Endru, Esaayaa Theerkkadharisi Nandraai Solliyirukkiraan Endraar.
10 pinbu Avar Janangalai Varavazhaiththu, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Kettu Unarungal.
11 vaaikkulle Pogiradhu Manushanaith Theettuppaduththaadhu; Vaayilirundhu Purappadugiradhe Manushanaith Theettuppaduththum Endraar.
12 appozhudhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avaridaththil Vandhu: Pariseyar Indha Vasanaththaik Kettu Idaraladaindhaargal Endru Ariveero Endraargal.
13 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: En Paramapidhaa Nadaadha Naatrellaam Verode Pidungappadum.
14 avargalai Vittuvidungal, Avargal Kurudarukku Vazhikaattugira Kurudaraayirukkiraargal; Kurudanukkuk Kurudan Vazhikaattinaal Iruvarum Kuzhiyile Vizhuvaargale Endraar.
15 appozhudhu, Pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Indha Uvamaiyai Engalukku Velippaduththavendum Endraan.
16 adharku Yesu: Neengalum Innum Unarvillaadhavargalaayirukkireergalaa?
17 vaaikkulle Pogiradhellaam Vayitril Sendru Aasanavazhiyaaik Kazhindhupom Enpadhai Neengal Innum Ariyavillaiyaa?
18 vaayilirundhu Purappadugiravaigal Irudhayaththilirundhu Purappattuvarum; Avaigale Manushanaith Theettuppaduththum.
19 eppadiyenil, Irudhayaththilirundhu Pollaadha Sindhanaigalum, Kolaipaadhakangalum, Vibachaarangalum, Vesiththanangalum, Kalavugalum, Poichsaatchigalum, Thooshanangalum Purappattuvarum.
20 ivaigale Manushanaith Theettuppaduththum; Kaikazhuvaamal Saappidugiradhu Manushanaith Theettuppaduththaadhu Endraar.
21 pinbu, Yesu Avvidam Vittup Purappattu, Theeru, Seedhon Pattanangalin Thisaigalukkup Ponaar.

22 appozhudhu, Andhath Thisaigalil Kudiyirukkira Kaanaaniya Sthiree Oruththi Avaridaththil Vandhu: Aandavare, Dhaaveedhin Kumaarane, Enakku Irangum, En Magal Pisaasinaal Kodiya Vedhanaippadugiraal Endru Sollik Kooppittaal.

23 avalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga Avar Oru Vaarththaiyum Sollavillai. Appozhudhu Avarudaiya Seeshargal Vandhu: Ival Nammaip Pin Thodarndhu Kooppidugiraale, Ivalai Anuppividum Endru Avarai Vendikkontaargal.
24 adharku Avar: Kaanaamarpona Aadugalaagiya Isravel Veettaaridaththirku Anuppappatteneyandri, Matrappadiyalla Endraar.
25 aval Vandhu: Aandavare, Enakku Udhaviseyyum Endru Avaraippanindhu Kondaal.
26 avar Avalai Nokki: Pillaigalin Appaththai Eduththu, Naaikkuttigalukkup Podugiradhu Nalladhalla Endraar.
27 adharku Aval: Meydhaan Aandavare, Aagilum Naaikkuttigal Thangal Ejamaangalin Mejaiyilirundhu Vizhukira Thunikkaigalaith Thinnume Endraal.
28 yesu Avalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Sthireeye, Un Visuvaasam Peridhu; Nee Virumpugirapadi Unakku Aagakkadavadhu Endraar. Annerame Aval Magal Aarokkiyamaanaal.
29 yesu Avvidam Vittup Purappattu, Galileyaa Kadalaruke Vandhu, Oru Malaiyin Mel Eri, Ange Utkaarndhaar.

30 appozhudhu, Sappaanigal, Kurudar, Oomaiyar, Oonar Mudhaliya Anegarai, Thiralaana Janangal Koottikkondu Yesuvidaththil Vandhu, Avargalai Avar Paadhaththile Vaiththaargal; Avargalai Avar Sosthappaduththinaar.
31 oomaiyar Pesugiradhaiyum, Oonar Sosthamadaigiradhaiyum, Sappaanigal Nadakkiradhaiyum, Kurudar Paarkkiradhaiyum, Janangal Kandu, Aachchariyappattu, Isravelin Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal.

32 pinbu, Yesu Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Azhaiththu: Janangalukkaagap Paridhapikkiren, Ivargal Ennidaththil Moondru Naatkal Thangiyirundhu Saappida Ondrumillaadhirukkiraargal; Ivargalaip Pattiniyaai Anuppivida Enakku Manadhillai, Vazhiyil Sorndhu Povaargale Endraar.
33 adharku Avarudaiya Seeshargal: Ivvalavu Thiralaana Janangalukkuth Thirupdhiyundaagumpadi Vendiya Appangal Indha Vanaandharaththile Namakku Eppadi Agappadum Endraargal.
34 adharku Yesu: Ungalidaththil Eththanai Appangal Undu Endru Kettaar. Avargal: Ezhu Appangalum Sila Siru Meengalum Undu Endraargal.
35 appozhudhu Avar Janangalaith Tharaiyil Pandhiyirukkak Kattalaiyittu,
36 andha Ezhu Appangalaiyum Andha Meengalaiyum Eduththu, Sthoththiram Panni, Pittuth Thammudaiya Seeshargalidaththil Koduththaar; Seeshargal Janangalukkup Parimaarinaargal.
37 ellaarum Saappittuth Thirupdhiyataindhaargal; Meedhiyaana Thunikkaigalai Ezhu Koodai Niraiya Eduththaargal.
38 sthireegalum Pillaigalum Thavira, Saappitta Purushar Naalaayiram Peraayirundhaargal.
39 avar Janangalai Anuppivittu, Padavil Eri, Makdhalaavin Ellaigalil Vandhaar.
